name: Love You UP!
description:
Little platform game created for Mini Jam #128
(Theme : Health - Limitation : The only way to go is up)

Updates

Patch notes v1.3

  • Reducing the damage amount when falling into holes
  • Changed the behavior of the moving platforms
  • Some levels have been changed
  • The last checkpoint has been removed
  • New dialogues have been added

Patch notes v1.2

  • Dialogues are played only once (you don't see them again if you ever come back to a checkpoint)
  • Dialogues display speed has been slightly increased
  • Updated some levels to prevent from being locked or stucked

Patch notes v1.1

  • Fixed an issue where the player was teleported to the next level
  • Fixed an issue with the checkpoint not working properly
  • Added a Game Over screen

Introduction

In this platform game, you need to help Joshua getting through some old dangerous mines using the keys U and P of your keyboard. Be quick, the Mist has invaded the area and reduces your maximum health regularly, as well as any effort you make reduce your health too ! Will Joshua manage to get back to his beloved Tristan ? <3

Controls

  • U to move left
    P to move right
    U + P to jump
    P and then U will make you jump on the right
    U and then P will make you jump on the left

Credits

Graphics Grafxkid
Font Arcadepix from Reekee of Dimenzioned
Music Filippo Game Audio
